pr_title: Add option to not treat async request timeouts as errors

timeline.message: Add 'trace.servlet.timeout.asError' property to control whether servlet3 async timeouts are treated as errors (default: true)
Update Jetty TagSettingAsyncListener to attach itself to following async requests like the generic servlet3 TagSettingAsyncListener
Make clear this is specific to servlet async timeouts
Remove camel-case from property name to match other properties

timeline.bodyText: I think my only remaining question is should the is- be removed? Don't have strong opinion either way though.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: Yes, I think that's reasonable: f04104f - avoids ending up with multiple is in the method name
replies.author: mcculls
